sections.description: WooNuxt is unmatched when it comes to performance and scalability. Reap the benefits of having a online store that out performs all of your competitors.
sections.changelog:
2.5.0

Add fullYoastHead field to drive frontend Yoast integration. Update plugin version metadata and changelog entries.

2.2.4

Major Architectural Refactoring: Complete plugin restructuring to class-based architecture following WordPress standards. New components include WooNuxt_Plugin (singleton), WooNuxt_Admin, WooNuxt_Ajax_Handler, and WooNuxt_Plugin_Manager classes. Added centralized helper functions, constants file, and template system. New GraphQL Schema Reference UI with collapsible details. Massively improved admin UI styling (1500+ CSS improvements). Enhanced code formatting and documentation. Fixes: Improved Stripe payment intent error handling, comprehensive debugging and validation for clientSecret generation to resolve Stripe.js integration issues. Total: 4,020 insertions, 799 deletions across 24 files.

2.2.3

Fix: Add missing Stripe payment intent and setup intent functions to resolve GraphQL stripePaymentIntent query errors.

2.2.2

Enable logout mutation by default. Fix: ensure $options['productsPerPage'] is set before accessing it.

2.2.1

Update WP GraphQL Headless Login version to 0.4.3.

2.2.0

Major security and code quality improvements: Enhanced AJAX security with nonces, comprehensive input sanitization, improved error handling, standardized function naming with woonuxt_ prefix, proper DocBlocks, better JavaScript error handling, and overall code organization.
